name: Chances (The Polyglot Programmer)
description:
"Life gives you Chances. What you do with it is you to You."

At the start of the game you have a limited number of “Chances” and you use can those to defend yourself or to help others. 

The game is set in a labyrinth of dark rooms and all you have is flash light. While wandering around the rooms you encounter good and bad people.  Your first task is to recognize them. 

You can use your chances to help the good people or to defend yourself against the bad people. By defending yourself you survive but do gain any points, when you help someone you earn points and gain more time. The goal is to have the most points when you die, which is inevitable, like life.

First time playing? Don't forget to check the controls in the game Settings.
